name: Jean ZEPPI, Respondent, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner

parties: Jean ZEPPI, Respondent, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The parties are directed to address the following issue:
1. What legally cognizable claims or claims arising in assumpsit, if any, has Jean Zeppi stated against the Pennsylvania State Police.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
855 A.2d 669
Jean ZEPPI, Respondent, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 17, 2004.
